ack.p: We are grateful to Argentina’s National Park Administration (APN) and Chile’s National Forestry Service (CONAF) for collaborating in this research, providing historical data, and for their ongoing commitment to huemul conservation. Especial thanks to park wardens of Los Alerces and Los Glaciares in Argentina, Torres del Paine, Bernardo O’Higgins, Ñuble, and Cochrane Lake national parks and reserves in Chile. We appreciated the support of Forestal Arauco S.A., Forestal Mininco S.A., Aaktei Energy Spa, AUMEN NGO, and National Committee for the Defense of Fauna and Flora (CODEFF).
